text: Simon David Spriggs (born 13 November 1968) is an Australian rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Australian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Australia Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Simon Spriggs
